content:
Certainly! Here are some examples of music videos that address issues of self-esteem and body positivity:

1. "Scars To Your Beautiful" by Alessia Cara - the music video features a diverse cast of people of different shapes, sizes, and genders, celebrating their unique beauty and encouraging viewers to embrace their own imperfections.

2. "Confident" by Demi Lovato - the music video delivers a message of self-empowerment and features Demi Lovato and other women of various ethnicities and body types celebrating their individuality and strength.

3. "All About That Bass" by Meghan Trainor - the music video celebrates body diversity by featuring women of all sizes and shapes, promoting the idea that all body types are beautiful.

4. "Hair" by Little Mix ft. Sean Paul - the music video celebrates inner beauty and self-expression by depicting different women of various backgrounds and styles embracing their unique hairstyles and personalities.

5. "Try" by Colbie Caillat - the music video portrays women of different ages, shapes, and colors, removing their makeup and revealing their natural beauty, promoting the idea that true beauty comes from within. 

These music videos have reached millions of people worldwide and have helped to spread the message of self-love and body positivity.
